ing: 1 (3 ounce) package green apple flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "Green apple gelatin mixed with cinnamon schnapps becomes a delicious shot, great for the holidays."
ins: Dissolve the gelatin mix in boiling water, stirring for about 2 minutes. Stir in the cold water and schnapps and pour into shot sized disposable cups. Refrigerate until firm, about 3 hours.
